title: Caribbean chicken meatballs
ingredients: ['600g chicken breast fillets', '1 clove garlic', '2 onions, sliced', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'juice of 1 lime', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'olive oil for frying', '300ml coconut milk', '1 glass water', '1 tablespoon poudre de colombo']
